message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $100 to me, but I understand its value may be different for you. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $95. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $85.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet my valuation. To continue our negotiation, I am proposing a price of $90 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value I place on it.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $87 for the product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I've considered your offer and am willing to negotiate further. I would like to suggest a price of $89 for the product. This reflects a compromise between our respective valuations.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to counter with an offer of $86 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. In light of our ongoing discussion, I would like to propose a price of $88 for the product. This is a fair compromise considering both our perspectives.
Considering our previous offers, I would like to counter with an offer of $87 for the product.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I've given it careful consideration and am willing to move forward with a price of $87.50 for the product. This represents a fair compromise and I believe it will be acceptable to both parties.
After considering our previous negotiations, I would like to finalize the deal at $87 for the product.
